item.title: GGB
item.description: score:967 Chances: Gerdau (GGB) has been upgraded to a Zacks Rank #2 (Buy), reflecting growing optimism about the company’s earnings prospects, which could drive the stock higher in the near term. Gerdau (GGB) made it through our ‘Fast-Paced Momentum at a Bargain’ screen, making it a potential choice for investors looking for stocks with strong recent momentum at reasonable prices.
